## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G25990](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G25990)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CIL</u>
- **Gene Name:** CIA2-like
- **Description:**   CCT motif family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2120850
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
